ðŸ“– Summary: This repository provides a reverse-engineered implementation of the WhatsApp Web API, focusing on WebSocket communication and encryption. It aims to provide a complete description of the API, enabling the development of custom WhatsApp Web clients. The project includes tools and instructions for setting up the environment using Nix or bare metal installations with Python and Node.js.
